main.name: Miraz Ahmed
main.description: A lifelong-learner with great passion for coding.
main.bio: I am a big fan of pursuing a active lifestyle. Physical activities boost up my confidence level and help me stay focused. Coding is a problem-solving skill which requires a lot of mental strength, which can be achieved through regular physical exercise. I find coding very interesting because it never stops being challenging. I believe that only challenge can bring the best out of a man. I first began learning about programming at Seneca. I learned C,C++,Java and JavaScript and a lot other technologies, frameworks and libraries. Currently my focus is solely on JavaScript. I started solving different problems at HackerRank to sharpen my JavaScript skills.

education.description: Programming languages: C, C++, Java, JavaScript. Frontend and Backened technologies: React, Angular and Node.Js. Database technologies: SQL, MongoDB. Operating System: Linux
Major courses studied: Business Mathematics, Statistics,Financial Accounting, Human Resource Management, Corporate Finance, Cost and Management Accounting,

work.title: Customer Service Associate
work.description: Served as cashier at teller. Answered customer queries and ensured maximum customer satisfaction. Received acknowledgement for collecting highest donation in the store received for "Habitat for Humanity".
